text:
**Input Key Pre-Market ****❤️**

Input Key is now available for upgrade — which means you can list it on Pre-Market in Portals

**How to do it:**
– Go to My Gifts → Add
– Select Pre-Market → Input Key collection
– Choose when it unlocks (we add 2 days by default for safety)

[**Trading before transfers go live**](https://t.me/portals/market?startapp=)
